item.title: Tether 任命 Simon McWilliams 为新任首席财务官
item.description: 加密货币公司 Tether 周一表示，已任命 Simon McWilliams 为新任首席财务官。【原文：Crypto firm Tether has appointed Simon McWilliams its new chief financial officer, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 特斯拉在斯堪的纳维亚半岛销量下滑，马斯克面临品牌考验
item.description: 由于首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政府中扮演的角色，这家电动汽车制造商面临着品牌忠诚度的考验。【原文：Tesla's Scandinavian sales fell sharply in February from a year ago, eroding its market share as the electric vehicle maker faces a test of brand loyalty amid CEO Elon Musk's role in U.S. President Donald Trump's administration.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为 2026 年铜价将达到 11,000 美元/吨，到 25 年第三季度末将征收 10%的关税
item.description: 摩根大通在周五的一份报告中称，该行预计到2026年全球精炼铜缺口将增至16万吨，并继续预测明年铜价平均约为每吨11000美元。【原文：JP Morgan expects the global deficit in refined to grow to 160,000 metric tons in 2026 and continues to forecast copper prices averaging around $11,000 per metric ton next year, the bank said in a note dated Friday.】

item.title: 早间竞标欧洲央行可能会绊倒在刺激政策上
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望未来一天的美国和全球市场。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan.】

item.title: 索纳特拉奇公司和沙特阿美公司将 3 月份的液化石油气价格下调 1-3
item.description: 贸易商周一表示，由于油价下跌和全球液化石油气需求疲软，沙特阿美公司和阿尔及利亚索纳特拉奇公司已将三月份的液化石油气（LPG）官方销售价格（OSP）比上月下调了 0.9-3.2%。【原文：Saudi Aramco and Algeria's Sonatrach have cut March's official selling prices (OSPs) for liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) by 0.9-3.2% from the previous month because of lower oil prices and weak global LPG demand, traders said on Monday.】

item.title: 克罗格公司因个人行为被调查而解雇长期首席执行官
item.description: 克罗格公司（Kroger）周一表示，公司首席执行官罗德尼-麦克马伦（Rodney McMullen）已卸任，因为董事会调查发现他的个人行为不符合该公司的 "商业道德政策"。【原文：Kroger said on Monday Chief Executive Officer Rodney McMullen has stepped down from the role after a board investigation found that his personal conduct was inconsistent with the grocer's "policy on business ethics".】

item.title: 微芯科技将裁员 2000 人
item.description: 芯片制造商微芯科技（Microchip Technology）周一表示，随着业务重组，公司将裁员约 2000 人。【原文：Chipmaker Microchip Technology said on Monday it will cut its workforce by about 2,000 employees as it restructures its business.】

item.title: 经济数据和关税成为焦点，期货价格上扬
item.description: 周一，在对主要贸易伙伴征收关税的关键截止日期到来之前，美国股指期货小幅上扬，而本周将有大量数据公布，可能会对全球最大经济体的健康状况产生影响。【原文：U.S. stock index futures inched up on Monday, ahead of a crucial deadline on tariffs on top trade partners and a data-packed week that could throw light on the health of the world's largest economy.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税威胁打击加拿大油气钻探商
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁征收关税，加拿大的油田钻探和服务业已经出现放缓迹象，这引发了人们的担忧，即如果继续征收关税，预期的行业反弹可能会停滞不前。【原文：Canada's oilfield drilling and services sector is already showing signs of slowing due to U.S. President Donald Trump's threatened tariffs, triggering fears that an expected industry rebound could stall if such levies go forward.】

item.title: 印度打击金融犯罪机构称 Paytm 违反外汇管理规定
item.description: 印度打击金融犯罪机构周一表示，其调查显示支付服务提供商 Paytm 及其部门违反了印度的《外汇管理法》，金额高达 61.1 亿卢比（约合 7000 万美元）。【原文：India's financial crime fighting agency said on Monday its investigation revealed that payment services provider Paytm and its units had violated the country's Foreign Exchange Management Act to the tune of 6.11 billion rupees ($70.00 million).】

item.title: 特朗普贸易威胁加剧全球海运不确定性
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）挑起与历史上的敌人以及邻国和盟国之间的贸易和地缘政治紧张局势，占世界贸易 80% 的全球远洋航运业正航行在一片未知的海洋中。【原文：The global ocean shipping industry that handles 80% of world trade is navigating a sea of unknowns as U.S. President Donald Trump stokes trade and geopolitical tensions with historical foes as well as neighbors and allies.】

item.title: 购物者转向小食品品牌，削减了联合利华和宝洁的利润
item.description: 大食品公司最可怕的噩梦正在美国超市的货架上上演。【原文：Big Food's worst nightmare is unfolding across U.S. supermarket aisles.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称英伟达和博通在英特尔制造工艺上测试芯片
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，芯片设计商英伟达（Nvidia）和博通（Broadcom）正在与英特尔合作进行生产测试，这表明了对这家陷入困境的公司先进生产技术的早期信心。【原文：Chip designers Nvidia and Broadcom are running manufacturing tests with Intel , two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters, demonstrating early confidence in the struggling company's advanced production techniques.】

item.title: 德国政党防务巨变令军火公司股价飙升
item.description: 据路透社报道，德国下届政府可能酝酿对欧洲最大的经济体进行财政改革，战后德国军费开支空前高涨的前景令周一欧洲国防类股飙升。【原文：The prospect of an unprecedented post-war military spending boom by Germany sent Europe's defence stocks soaring on Monday after Reuters reported the likely next government was mulling a fiscal sea change for Europe's biggest economy.】

item.title: 独家报道：Reddit 联合创始人亚历克西斯-奥哈尼安（Alexis Ohanian）加入弗兰克-麦考特收购 TikTok 的行列
item.description: 弗兰克-麦考特（Frank McCourt）周一宣布，Reddit 联合创始人、风险投资人亚历克西斯-奥哈尼安（Alexis Ohanian）已加入其收购 TikTok 美国业务的竞标，担任社交媒体领域的战略顾问。【原文：Frank McCourt announced on Monday that Alexis Ohanian, the co-founder of Reddit and a venture capitalist, has joined his bid to acquire TikTok's U.S. operations as a strategic adviser specializing in social media.】

item.title: 英国要求社交媒体公司在 3 月 31 日前评估网络风险
item.description: 英国媒体监管机构通信管理局（Ofcom）周一规定，社交媒体和其他网络平台必须在 3 月 31 日之前提交一份风险评估报告，说明用户在其网站上遇到非法内容的可能性有多大。【原文：Britain's media regulator Ofcom on Monday set social media and other online platforms a March 31 deadline to submit a risk assessment around how likely users are to encounter illegal content on their sites.】

item.title: 条款书显示，比亚迪启动股票销售，最多筹资 52 亿美元
item.description: 根据路透社周一看到的一份交易条款书，中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪已开始出售其香港股票，通过加速建账筹集最多 52 亿美元。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD , has launched a sale of its Hong Kong shares to raise up to $5.2 billion via an accelerated book-building, according to a deal term sheet seen by Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀走低，欧洲央行降息押注升温
item.description: 欧元区上月通胀率略低于预期，但最受关注的通胀要素也有所下降，这为欧洲央行周四再次降息奠定了基础，并巩固了未来几个月进一步放宽政策的赌注。【原文：Euro zone inflation dipped a bit less than expected last month but its most closely watched component also dropped, sealing the case for another ECB interest rate cut on Thursday and solidifying bets for further policy easing in the coming months.】

item.title: 价格屡创新高，巴西咖啡库存减少
item.description: 在巴西的一个咖啡仓库里，通常堆满了 25 万袋芳香四溢的咖啡豆。【原文：In a Brazilian coffee warehouse usually stuffed with a quarter of a million bags of the aromatic bean, voices echo in the largely empty space at a large producers' cooperative.】

item.title: 亚马逊推出人工智能计划，应对西班牙阿拉贡地区的洪水风险
item.description: 科技巨头亚马逊周一表示，将在西班牙东北部阿拉贡地区利用人工智能降低洪水风险，亚马逊正在该地区建设数据中心。【原文：Tech giant Amazon on Monday said it will use artificial intelligence to reduce flood risks in Spain's northeastern region of Aragon where it is building data centres.】

item.title: Stellantis 提议新增两名董事会成员，以加强技术专长和财务监督
item.description: 随着七名高管任期的结束，汽车制造商 Stellantis 周一表示，已提名 Daniel Ramot 和 Alice Schroeder 为新的董事会成员，并提议其他五人连任。【原文：Carmaker Stellantis has nominated Daniel Ramot and Alice Schroeder as new board members, as well as proposing the re-election of five others, it said on Monday, as the mandates of seven of its executives come to an end.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，受美国关税影响，本田将在印第安纳州而非墨西哥生产下一代思域轿车
item.description: 据三位熟知内情的人士透露，本田公司已决定在美国印第安纳州而非墨西哥生产下一代思域混合动力车，以避免对其最畅销的汽车车型之一征收潜在关税。【原文：Honda has decided to produce its next-generation Civic hybrid in the U.S. state of Indiana, instead of Mexico, to avoid potential tariffs on one of its top-selling car models, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 标普全球称美国关税可能会削弱中欧增长前景
item.description: S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）告诉路透社，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提议对从欧盟进口的商品征收25%的关税，这可能会影响中欧的增长前景，加剧现有的财政挑战。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's proposal to impose 25% tariffs on imports from the European Union is likely to dent growth prospects in Central Europe, compounding existing fiscal challenges, S&P Global Ratings told Reuters.】

item.title: 部长称新加坡诈骗案中使用的服务器可能含有 Nvidia 芯片
item.description: 新加坡政府一位部长周一表示，新加坡上周公布的一起欺诈案中使用的服务器由美国公司提供，其中可能包含 Nvidia 的先进芯片。【原文：Servers used in a fraud case that Singapore announced last week were supplied by U.S. firms and may have contained Nvidia's advanced chips, a government minister said on Monday.】

item.title: 挪威航空公司将从波音公司购买 10 架租赁飞机
item.description: 挪威航空公司（Norwegian）周一表示，该公司已同意购买10架波音737-800飞机，这些飞机目前属于其租赁机队。【原文：Budget carrier Norwegian has agreed to buy 10 Boeing 737-800 aircraft that are currently part of its leased fleet, the airline said on Monday.】

item.title: 英国自动驾驶初创公司 Wayve 进军德国，建立新的测试和开发中心
item.description: 英国初创公司 Wayve 周一表示，将在德国建立一个新的测试和开发中心，并在斯图加特地区部署一支测试车队。【原文：British startup Wayve will establish a new testing and development hub in Germany, deploying a fleet of test vehicles in the Stuttgart region, the self-driving technology firm said on Monday.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行前首席执行官斯塔利就爱泼斯坦言论提出英国禁令上诉
item.description: 巴克莱银行前老板杰斯-斯塔利（Jes Staley）将于周一高调上诉，反对英国金融业对他的禁入提议，这将再次凸显他与声名狼藉的金融家杰弗里-爱泼斯坦（Jeffrey Epstein）的关系。【原文：Former Barclays boss Jes Staley will on Monday mount a high-profile appeal against his proposed ban from Britain's finance industry, which will once again highlight his relationship with disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein.】

item.title: 官员称特朗普关税逼近，印度贸易部长赴美会谈
item.description: 两位政府官员表示，印度贸易部长皮尤什-戈亚尔（Piyush Goyal）周一开始访问美国，寻求贸易谈判。【原文：India's trade minister Piyush Goyal started on a trip to the United States on Monday to pursue trade talks, two government officials said, with weeks to go for President Donald Trump's planned reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 早间竞标特朗普标榜加密货币储备，但对资金问题讳莫如深
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 南非 RCL 食品公司半年盈利增长 38.8%
item.description: 南非食品生产商 RCL Foods 周一报告称，其半年盈利增长了 38.8%，这主要归功于其杂货和烘焙业务的增长。【原文：South African food producer RCL Foods reported on Monday a 38.8% rise in half-year earnings, largely due to gains in its groceries and baking businesses.】
